entry.title: RT EigenLayer: Exciting news! EigenLayer will raise the cap for LST restaking on Aug 22 at 7am PT. A global pause will take place if any one LST hits ...
entry.summary: RT EigenLayer Exciting news! EigenLayer will raise the cap for LST restaking on Aug 22 at 7am PT. A global pause will take place if any one LST hits approximately 100k ETH restaked. Read the blog post for full details 👇 https://www.blog.eigenlayer.xyz/eigenlayer-announces-new-cap-increase-for-liquid-staking-tokens-lsts/
